5bafa263-6cff-4a6d-bd2d-701b081ed1d6.name: Cluster Total Disk Space (Less Local Datastores)
5bafa263-6cff-4a6d-bd2d-701b081ed1d6.formula: ${this, metric=diskspace|total_capacity}-sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=Datastore, metric=DiskSpace|capacity, depth=10, where = "summary|isLocal equals true" })
5bafa263-6cff-4a6d-bd2d-701b081ed1d6.description: Subtracts the total disk space of child local datastores from the cluster total disk space metric.
